title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.22 - Doors, windows to be locked and utility services turned off upon leaving
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1290.22 - Doors, windows to be locked and utility services turned off upon leaving

State Regulations

All occupants of space at the World Trade Center shall
before leaving the same at any time, close and lock all entrance doors and
close all windows therein and turn off all utility services controllable by the
occupant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1290.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
